EmailTemplate.subject: DuPont privacy request - Deletion
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear Mr./Ms. {!Lead.LastName},
We have received your request for the deletion of the personal information that DuPont has concerning you.
Be advised that your personal information has been deleted from our customer database(s).
For further queries and assistance, please contact us using the details provided below.
Sincerely,
DuPont Inquiry Management Center
Toll-free number : 00800 3876 68 38
Phone : 0034 985 12 37 73
Fax : 0034 912 72 52 37
E-mail: eu-info@dupont.com
